Admission_First_Year_Btech: The candidate must have passed the intermediate examination of U.P. Board
10+2 level examination from any recognized board/university
Securing minimum 45% (40% for SC/ST) marks in total of required subject combination
Admission_First_Year_B.Pharm: Candidate must have passed (with/without grace) intermediate examination of U.P. Board
10+2 level examination or its equivalent with Physics and Chemistry
compulsory subjects along with Mathematics/ Biology subjects.
Admission_First_Year_MCA: The candidate must have passed three years degree course from any recognized University;
securing a minimum 50% (45% for SC/ST) marks in aggregate.
The candidate must have a minimum 50% (45% for SC/ST) marks in mathematics at 10 + 2 level or bachelorâ€™s degree level.
Admission_First_Year_MBA: The candidate must have passed three years of degree course from any recognized University;
securing a minimum 45% (40% for SC/ST) marks in aggregate.
Admission_Lateral_Entry_Btech: The candidate must have passed three years of Diploma in Engineering
securing a minimum 45% (40% for SC/ST) marks in mathematics.
Admission_Lateral_Entry_B.Pharam: The candidate must have passed three years of Diploma in Pharmacy
Other_Process: The admission of NRI and Kashmiri migrants will be according to the norms laid down by the Govt of UP/AICTE
This admission test is open only for candidates who have passed the qualifying examination from any institution located in U.P and the parents, father/mother of the students must be domiciles of U.P
